content: Install backend dependencies (Pillow for photo processing, python-multipart for file upload)
Create database models: Member, FamilyGroup, CareEvent, GriefSupport, NotificationLog
Create utility functions: engagement calculator, grief timeline generator, photo upload handler
Implement Member CRUD endpoints with family grouping support
Implement CareEvent CRUD with auto-grief-timeline generation
Implement GriefSupport endpoints for timeline management
Implement Dashboard endpoints (stats, at-risk, active grief, hospital follow-up)
Implement photo upload endpoint and storage
Implement CSV/JSON import and CSV export endpoints
Install frontend dependencies (react-i18next, date-fns, recharts)
Set up design tokens and Google Fonts in index.css
Set up react-i18next with ID/EN translation files
Create reusable components (LanguageToggle, EngagementBadge, EventTypeBadge, MemberAvatar, GriefTimeline)
Build Dashboard with stats and priority widgets
Build Members List with search, filter, and sorting
Build Member Detail with tabbed interface
Build Add/Edit Member Form with photo upload
Build Add/Edit Care Event Form with conditional fields
Build Grief Support Timeline visualization
Build Financial Aid Dashboard with charts
Build Analytics Dashboard with multiple charts
Build Import/Export interface
Test grief support flow end-to-end
Test hospital care flow with visitation logs
Test financial aid tracking and analytics
Test multi-language switching throughout app
Run automated testing agent and fix bugs
